page.title: 08Industry (Part3)
page.content:
{A.K.N Enterprise.
This factory is on the same site as both the Norgine and Cheverton and Laidler factories,and distributes cleaning materials to all areas. Between Tir-y-berth and Pengam are the Austin Rover and Burlington Fabrics factories. The Austin Rover factory produces two hundred different components and one hundred and ninety thousand finished parts,for the Mini Metro,Maestro and Montego ranges,as well as Leyland trucks,buses and tractors.The factory employs one hundred and twenty nine people,most of whom are disabled.Originally the factory only employed disabled miners,but now employs other disabled people including a blind man.The parts are sent to Birmingham for inspection.
